title: Pre-existing merge conflicts and type errors blocking typecheck
issue: The codebase contains unresolved merge conflicts and type errors in multiple files that prevent `pnpm typecheck` from passing. These are pre-existing issues unrelated to TKT-083 changes.
errors: TS1185: Merge conflict marker encountered (multiple files)
TS1128: Declaration or statement expected (test files)
TS1005: Various syntax errors due to unresolved conflicts
suggestion: Resolve merge conflicts in affected files and ensure clean merge from main branch. Files show merge conflict markers (<<<<<<, =======, >>>>>>>) that need manual resolution.
impact: Blocks CI/CD pipeline typecheck validation. Prevents verification of new code changes. Affects developer workflow.
